quests.desc: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an fast paced round of TextWorld? You do! Here is your task for today. Your first objective is to make an effort to venture east. Following that, make an effort to go north. And then, try to venture west. That done, move west. Next, attempt to go to the south. Following that, go south. And then, go east. With that over with, make an attempt to travel south. After that, head south. Then, take the fork from the bowl. Got that? Good!

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
Okay, so you're in a cookhouse, cool, but is it standard? You better believe it is. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 Hey, want to see a bowl? Look over there, a bowl. The bowl is typical.[if there is something on the s_0] On the bowl you can make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: pantry
infos.desc:
You arrive in a pantry. An usual kind of place. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 [if c_0 is locked]A locked[else if c_0 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] normal looking trunk is here.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_0]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The trunk is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You make out a stand. [if there is something on the s_1]On the stand you make out [a list of things on the s_1]. It doesn't get more TextWorld than this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But there isn't a thing on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You're not going to believe this, but you've just entered a playroom.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a garage.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a studio.

 You see a bureau. Wow, isn't TextWorld just the best?[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The bureau contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The bureau is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You see a box.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The box contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You arrive in a workshop. A typical kind of place. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building.

 You make out [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] typical looking cabinet in the corner.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You are in a study. A normal kind of place.

 As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a chair. The chair is normal.[if there is something on the s_2] On the chair you make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of trash. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
If you're wondering why everything seems so typical all of a sudden, it's because you've just sauntered into the washroom.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the office.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You've entered a normal room. Your mind races to think of what kind of room would be normal. And then it hits you. Of course. You're in the vault. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 You can see a workbench. You shudder, but continue examining the workbench. [if there is something on the s_3]On the workbench you can make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a cellar. A normal kind of place.

 You can make out a shelf. The shelf is standard.[if there is something on the s_4] On the shelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You can make out a counter. The counter is standard.[if there is something on the s_5] On the counter you can make out [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
Of every kitchen you could have sauntered into, you had to come round a standard one.

 You see a rack. The rack is normal.[if there is something on the s_6] On the rack you can see [a list of things on the s_6]. Hmmm... what else, what else?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You've entered a basement. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You can make out [if c_4 is locked]a locked[else if c_4 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] normal looking toolbox here.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The toolbox contains [a list of things in the c_4]. You check the price tag that the toolbox's owner still hasn't taken off. Fifty bucks?! That's ridiculous! You know my good friend, they work for a company? I'm sure my friend could get you one of those for 55 bucks![end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
You are in a dish-pit. An ordinary kind of place.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You arrive in a bedchamber. A normal one.

 You make out a bench. [if there is something on the s_7]You see [a list of things on the s_7] on the bench.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7]But the thing is empty, unfortunately. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You find yourself in an attic. A normal kind of place. You begin looking for stuff.

 You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a display. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The display contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The display is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You are in a cookery. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a non-euclidean safe.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The non-euclidean safe contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You see a Microsoft safe.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The Microsoft safe contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The Microsoft safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a shower.

 You can see a Henderson's style safe.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The Henderson's style safe contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The Henderson's style safe is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
A crooked notice tells you that you are now in the spare room.

 You can make out a TextWorld limited edition box.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The TextWorld limited edition box contains [a list of things in the c_9].[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a rack. The rack is shoddy.[if there is something on the s_8] On the shoddy rack you make out [a list of things on the s_8]. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if] What's that over there? It looks like it's a shelf. The shelf is shoddy.[if there is something on the s_9] On the shoddy shelf you can see [a list of things on the s_9].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk. This always happens![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
Wow! You're in a closet. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 Look over there! a chest.[if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_10].[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] The chest is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You can make out a table. You shudder, but continue examining the table. The table is normal.[if there is something on the s_10] On the table you can make out [a list of things on the s_10].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.desc: it is what it is, a gate [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The trunk looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: The box looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The cabinet looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: burger
infos.desc: The burger looks appetizing.

infos.name: onion
infos.desc: that's a standard onion!

infos.name: sandwich
infos.desc: that's a typical sandwich!

infos.name: non-euclidean key
infos.desc: The metal of the non-euclidean key is brushed.

infos.name: Microsoft latchkey
infos.desc: The metal of the Microsoft latchkey is polished.

infos.name: tv
infos.desc: The tv appears to be well matched to everything else here

infos.name: pair of pants
infos.desc: The pair of pants is modern.

infos.name: nest of toads
infos.desc: The nest of toads would seem to be out of place here

infos.name: scarf
infos.desc: The scarf is well-used.

infos.name: bowl
infos.desc: The bowl is wobbly.

infos.name: stand
infos.desc: The stand is balanced.

infos.name: table
infos.desc: The table is shaky.

infos.name: chair
infos.desc: The chair is solid.

infos.name: workbench
infos.desc: The workbench is unstable.

infos.name: shelf
infos.desc: The shelf is durable.

infos.name: counter
infos.desc: The counter is balanced.

infos.name: rack
infos.desc: The rack is solidly built.

infos.name: bench
infos.desc: The bench is stable.

infos.name: shoddy rack
infos.desc: The shoddy rack is unstable.

infos.name: shoddy shelf
infos.desc: The shoddy shelf is solidly built.

infos.name: broccoli
infos.desc: that's a normal broccoli!

infos.name: legume
infos.desc: that's an ordinary legume!

infos.name: peanut
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that normal thing.

infos.name: Henderson's style latchkey
infos.desc: The Henderson's style latchkey looks useful

infos.name: TextWorld limited edition passkey
infos.desc: The TextWorld limited edition passkey is heavier than it looks.

infos.name: sponge
infos.desc: The sponge seems to fit in here

infos.name: cloak
infos.desc: The cloak is unremarkable.

infos.name: butterfly
infos.desc: The butterfly would seem to be out of place here

infos.name: fork
infos.desc: The fork appears well matched to everything else here

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First of all, you could, like, go east. And then, travel north. Then, try to travel west. And then, make an effort to go west. After that, try to go to the south. Then, move south. And then, travel east. Once you manage that, try to take a trip south. Following that, make an attempt to move south. Following that, take the fork from the bowl within the cookhouse. And once you've done that, you win!
